title: setblock指令如何设置条件制约
author: tianqi482
txt_content: 如题，比如放置一个坐标是 0 0 0 的连锁、条件制约、保持开启、面朝东的连锁命令方块。

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content:
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/setblock
朝向好像没办法
/setblock 0 0 0 minecraft:chain_command_block 0 replace

replies.author: tianqi482
replies.txt_content:
PTSD∝龌龊闵 发表于 2020-5-3 11:53
https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E5%91%BD%E4%BB%A4/setblock
朝向好像没办法
/setblock 0 0 0 minecr ...
/setblock 0 0 0 minecraft:chain_command_block facing=east replace
朝向我都会（话说你又用生成器了吧）
而且重点是条件制约

replies.author: HtYang
replies.txt_content: 朝向设置其NBT就是有办法了

replies.author: HtYang
replies.txt_content: MC模组百科的命令生成器有自动生成命令方块的

replies.author: HtYang
replies.txt_content: 个人认为高版本用数据包更简单

replies.author: tianqi482
replies.txt_content:
HtYang 发表于 2020-5-4 17:01
个人认为高版本用数据包更简单
版本1.12.2
其实吧……生成器似乎没有条件制约选项

replies.author: HtYang
replies.txt_content:
tianqi482 发表于 2020-5-4 17:34
版本1.12.2
其实吧……生成器似乎没有条件制约选项
你的条件制约是啥意思

replies.author: 小林最牛
replies.txt_content:
Mc天启解说 发表于 2020-5-3 14:07
朝向没办法
朝向有办法
/setblock 0 0 0 minecraft:chain_command_block facing=east replace
朝向：facing=east
